IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ANGLICAN RELIEF AND DEVELOPMENT FUND'S (ARDF) MISSION IS TO WORK ALONGSIDE STRATEGIC PARTNERS TO ALLEVIATE SUFFERING THROUGH DISASTER RELIEF AND FOSTER THE FLOURISHING OF COMMUNITIES THROUGH DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS, EXPANDING THE KINGDOM OF CHRIST THROUGH TANGIBLE WORKS OF COMPASSION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ANGLICAN RELIEF AND DEVELOPMENT FUND'S (ARDF) MISSION IS TO WORK ALONGSIDE STRATEGIC PARTNERS TO ALLEVIATE SUFFERING THROUGH DISASTER RELIEF AND FOSTER THE FLOURISHING OF COMMUNITIES THROUGH DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS, EXPANDING THE KINGDOM OF CHRIST THROUGH TANGIBLE WORKS OF COMPASSION.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTS ARE USED FOR DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS. FISCAL YEAR CONTRIBUTIONS WERE GRANTED FOR THE FOLLOWING PROJECTS: EDUCATION IN EGYPT, CAMBODIA, GUATEMALA, KENYA, RWANDA, MADAGASCAR, NEPAL, TANZANIA, AND THAILAND; COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT IN GUATEMALA, KENYA, NEPAL, NIGERIA, UGANDA, AND ZAMBIA; HEALTH CARE IN GHANA AND UGANDA; CLERGY/DIOCESAN SUPPORT IN IRAQ, NEPAL, AND KENYA.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: GRANTS ARE USED FOR RELIEF PROJECTS. FISCAL YEAR CONTRIBUTIONS WERE GRANTED FOR THE FOLLOWING INTERNATIONAL RELIEF EVENTS: COVID: MYANMAR; EBOLA: UGANDA; CYCLONE FREDDY: ZAMBIA AND MALAWI; CYCLONE MOCHA: MYANMAR; DROUGHT: KENYA; EARTHQUAKE: TURKEY AND SYRIA; FLOODING: DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF THE CONGO, RWANDA, CAMBODIA, AND PAKISTAN; FAMINE: UGANDA, MYANMAR, KENYA; INTERNALLY DISPLACED PEOPLE: MYANMAR; WAR RELIEF: UKRAINE; GENERAL: CUBA AND ANGOLA.DOMESTIC RELIEF EVENTS INCLUDE HURRICANE IAN: FLORIDA; TORNADOS: MISSISSIPPI AND ARKANSAS; FLOODING: KENTUCKY AND ILLINOIS; REFUGEE RESETTLEMENT: FLORIDA.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ARDF ACCOUNTS FOR UNCERTAINTIES IN INCOME TAXES IN ACCORDANCE WITH AUTHORITATIVE GUIDANCE, WHICH PRESCRIBES A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD OF MORE LIKELY THAN NOT TO BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE APPROPRIATE TAXING AUTHORITY. MEASUREMENT OF THE TAX UNCERTAINTY OCCURS IF THE RECOGNITION THRESHOLD HAS BEEN MET. DURING THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023, ARDF DID NOT IDENTIFY ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. TAX RETURNS FILED BY ARDF ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE FOR A PERIOD OF THREE YEARS. WHILE NO INCOME TAX RETURNS ARE CURRENTLY BEING EXAMINED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE, TAX YEARS SINCE 2019 REMAIN OPEN. ARDF'S POLICY IS TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST RELATED TO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS IN INTEREST EXPENSE AND PENALTIES IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE ON THE STATEMENTS OF FUNCTIONAL EXPENSES.

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.SpecificServicesProvidedTxt: CYCLONE RELIEF, FLOODING RELIEF, FAMINE RELIEF, AND HOLY CROSS SEMINARY
LANGUAGE SCHOOL PROJECT AND SYRIA EARTHQUAKES RELIEF
FLOODING RELIEF, CHRISTMAS RELIEF, AND SCHOOL PROJECTS
DROUGHT RELIEF, TUMAINI SPONSORSHIPS, SUPPLIES FOR MEDICAL CENTER, WATER WELL, AND BAKERY PROJECT

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: RUSSIA AND NEIGHBORING STATES - ARMENIA, AZERBIJAN, BELARUS,

GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: IDP RELIEF, CYCLONE MOCHA, AND FAMINE RELIEF
DROUGHT RELIEF, TUMAINI SCHOLARSHIPS, DIOCESE SCHOLARSHIPS, AND BOYS HS PHASE II
FOOD AND SHELTER FOR CHILD LED HOUSEHOLD
EBOLA RELIEF AND PURCHASE OF VAN
LAB FOR TUMAINI ACADEMY, TUMAINI SPONSORSHIPS, DIOCESE SCHOLARSHIPS, AND DROUGHT RELIEF
MOTORCYCLES FOR CLERGY AND FAMINE RELIEF

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ARDF RECEIVES PICTURES AND PROGRESS REPORTS FOR EACH PROJECT, AND AGREED-UPON PROGRESS OUTLINED IN A MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING MUST BE MET BEFORE ADDITIONAL FUNDS ARE SENT. UPON COMPLETION OF EACH PROJECT, AN INDEPENDENT RESEARCH AGENCY COMPARES EXPECTED RESULTS WITH ACTUAL RESULTS AND DOCUMENTS ITS FINDINGS IN A IMPACT ASSESSMENT REPORT.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE ANGLICAN DIOCESE OF THE UPPER MIDWEST

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SCHOLARSHIP FOR REST AND REFRESHMENT FOR PASTORS

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: GULF ATLANTIC DIOCESE OF THE ACNA INC
APOSTLES BY THE SEA ANGLICAN CHURCH

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: UKRAINE REFUGEE RESETTLEMENT IN LOCAL CHURCH COMMUNITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES RELIEF UPDATES FROM THE DIOCESES OR CHURCHES WHO RECEIVE THE FUNDS. UPDATES INCLUDE REPORTS, PICTURES, AND TESTIMONIES FROM THE CHURCHES, PEOPLE, AND COMMUNITIES THAT ARE RECIPIENTS OF THE RELIEF.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DEPUTY DIRECTOR, EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, AND ACCOUNTANT WILL REVIEW THE FORM 990 AND WILL ADDRESS ANY QUESTIONS TO THE PREPARER. THE DEPUTY DIRECTOR WILL SEND THE FORM 990 TO THE ARDF-US EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND FINANCE COMMITTEE FOR THEIR REVIEW AND APPROVAL. AFTER THEIR REVIEW AND APPROVAL (WITH ANY CHANGES CORRECTED), THE 990 WILL BE FINALIZED AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE WILL REPORT THIS INFORMATION AT THE NEXT ARDF-US TRUSTEE MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURES ARE COMPLETED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. ANY CONFLICTS ARE DISCUSSED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND ADDRESSED ACCORDINGLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION IS SET BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. WAGES ARE BASED ON COMPARABLE DATA SUCH AS COMPENSATION LEVELS PAID BY SIMILAR INSTITUTIONS AND THE AVAILABILITY OF SIMILAR SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ANGLICAN RELIEF AND DEVELOPMENT FUND MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE ARDF BOARD OF TRUSTEES FORMED A FINANCE COMMITTEE TO COMMUNICATE WITH THE ORGANIZATION'S INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANTS DURING THE 2022-2023 FISCAL YEAR.
